title: LogLion Parser Configuration
description: Schema for LogLion log parser configuration files

timestamp_format.description: Go time format string for parsing timestamps. Leave empty if timestamps are not needed.

event_regex.description: Regular expression to extract event data from log lines. Defaults to entire line.

json_extraction.description: Whether to attempt JSON parsing from extracted event data

log_line_regex.description: Regular expression to parse the entire log line structure
